subsection_content:
Pyelonephritis is a dangerous disease with fatal complications if not detected and treated promptly. However, the disease can be prevented if people pay attention to their health, maintain hygiene, monitor unusual developments in the body, and go for regular medical examinations. To prevent disease, we need to comply with:
It is necessary to keep the genital and urinary organs clean, especially women must clean thoroughly during menstruation, after sex...; Drink enough water every day, the amount of water is 2-2.5 liters. Ensure urine output is 1.5-2 liters/day, do not hold urine.; People with symptoms of urinary tract infection, causing urinary tract obstruction, need to be treated early, to prevent complications, causing pyelonephritis.; Especially people with kidney-urinary diseases, especially those with urinary stones, must drink plenty of water and limit foods that contain a lot of calcium.; Regular health checks can help detect hidden infections, which can then be treated completely.
Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of leading experts, Internal Medicine and Surgery, highly skilled and dedicated. Center Director - Meritorious Physician Assoc. Prof. Dr. Vu Le Chuyen, Deputy Director - Meritorious Physician Dr. SKII Ta Phuong Dung are giants in the field of Urology and Nephrology in Vietnam.
The Center's experts and doctors are always confident in mastering the latest techniques, early detecting and effectively treating kidney and urinary tract diseases, helping patients shorten hospital stays and limit risk of recurrence, improving quality of life.
Equipped with the leading modern machinery and equipment systems in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with 5-star boarding facilities and high-end services…  The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases.
From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries. These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects...
To schedule an examination and treatment for kidney failure with leading experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, you can make an appointment online through the following ways:
+ Call hotline 0287 102 6789 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through customer service staff.
+ Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/
+ Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage
+ Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
Acute pyelonephritis that recurs many times if not treated properly will lead to extremely dangerous complications such as chronic pyelonephritis and chronic kidney failure. Therefore, when diagnosed with the disease, the patient should cooperate with the doctor in treatment to prevent the disease from progressing seriously.
